set meta-flag on
set convert-meta off
set input-meta on
set output-meta on

"\e[1~": beginning-of-line		# Home
"\e[2~": overwrite-mode			# Insert
"\e[3~": delete-char			# Delete
"\e[4~": end-of-line			# End/K7
"\e[5~": history-search-backward 	# Previous
"\e[6~": history-search-forward		# Next
